alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Monument; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 1:29PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern San Benito and southeastern Santa Clara Counties through 215 PM PST... At 128 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ridgemark, or 7 miles east of Hollister, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gilroy, Hollister and Ridgemark. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
